content.description: Start at the same location for Conceptual Reality, but as the crack forks, take the right fork.  It is a decent crack except for the fighting past 2 small trees.  Gain an very easy slab where the crack dies, (a bit runout, but very easy) and gain a wide crack with a couple more trees and a serious amount of spider-webs.  This wide crack has a bit of flaky rock on the left side.
content.protection: Medium size gear for the 1st crack, and slings for the trees on the upper crack and maybe a medium piece or two.
content.location: Same start as Conceptual Reality, in a hollow on the east face.

content.description:
Fun moves for 4 bolts then the route merges with

I've Got Gall

to finish on upper face.
content.location: Start further right of arete up slightly steeper wall.

content.description:
This route goes up the center of the steep north face of the gallstone.

Scramble up the right edge of the belay slab/boulder to a high first bolt shared with Seizure (a stick clip would be handy).

Meningitis

goes straight up while

Seizure

breaks off right.  4 bolts to anchors up and right--easy runout to anchors.  The bolt line to the left is

Toxic Shock

12c.

If you like crimps and gastons, you'll probably like this route.  Short but sustained.
Bolt line on arete with 4 bolts to easy slab then 2 more bolts and chains.  Bolted nicely (aka Kevin Pogue style).  Fun moves top and bottom.  Would get more stars if the middle section wasn't there.
content.location: Right of Conceptual Reality on the arete.

content.description: Along the east side, is a nice looking crack right of a neck of rock.  Climb this crack til you gain a nice flake to stand on.  Follow the closely spaced bolts up the arete.
content.protection: 8? bolts to 2 chain anchors.  The bottom crack could use 3 or 3 pieces.  Medium gear.
content.location: East face in a hollow of rock with a crack.

content.description: Start up the crack for Conceptual Reality.  Before the crack runs out, cut right to the large, twin cracks.  Work up the wide cracks until you reach the tree.  Sling the two little trees if you like and then head up the unprotected, but easy, face to the chains of Conceptual Reality.
content.protection: Larger rack (0.75-#4) and a sling or two.  Takes about 5 pieces to sew it up.
content.location: East side of the Gallstone.  Between Conceptual Reality and Rock Lobster.  See pic.
